message: Interesting post about left/right brian thinking and science (http://blog.the-scientist.com/2011/03/29/what-kind-of-scientist-are-you/).  I have sort of mixed feeling about it.   I agree that people should generally lighten up, but I am less sure about the specific activities (music).  Thoughts?

I read "A whole new mind" a couple of months ago.  It's a decent book, but not spectacular.  The book that really changed the way I think about innovation is called "Group Genius," written by Keith Sawyer.
